label: A6BC10_hR17_166_3c_a_5c-001
title: MnBi$_{6}$Te$_{10}$ Structure
comments:
The ICSD entry lists $x_{9}$ = 0.4446, while the text of (Aliev, 2019) gives 0.41446.  The difference is large enough that <tt>xprototype</tt> declares the two lattices unmatchable.  The value of 0.41446 gives atomic positions consistent with Fig. 5 of (Alieve, 2019) -- all Bi-Mn-Te layers are terminated by Te surfaces -- so we use that value. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
